message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations. Given its unique value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering this remarkable product to you for $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we hope our proposal will be within your budget and aligns with our goal of maximizing value for both parties involved.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, $950,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it. This would still be a significant profit for you, and it allows me to stay within my spending limit. Let me know what you think.
